########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})
list(APPEND fastpsk_sources
    imath.cc
    prbs.cc
    ctrl_loop.cc
    agc_impl.cc
    costas_impl.cc
    mm_crec_impl.cc
    qdelay_impl.cc
    fir_filter_ssf_impl.cc
    bert_sink_impl.cc
    bert_source_impl.cc
    deambiguity_impl.cc
    npsk_slicer_impl.cc
    deambiguity_cc_impl.cc
    cf32_to_sc16_impl.cc
    sc16_to_cf32_impl.cc
    npsk_lockdet_impl.cc )

set(fastpsk_sources "${fastpsk_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT fastpsk_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT fastpsk_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-fastpsk SHARED ${fastpsk_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-fastpsk ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-fastpsk PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_fastpsk_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-fastpsk PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-fastpsk RUNTIME_COMPONENT "fastpsk_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "fastpsk_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

include_directories(${CPPUNIT_INCLUDE_DIRS})

list(APPEND test_fastpsk_sources
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_fastpsk.cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_fastpsk.cc
)

add_executable(test-fastpsk ${test_fastpsk_sources})

target_link_libraries(
  test-fastpsk
  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
  gnuradio-fastpsk
)

GR_ADD_TEST(test_fastpsk test-fastpsk)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
